bodyContent:
### Research Experience December, 2017 --- Current
**University of Tokyo**, [**ERATO Project**](http://www.jst.go.jp/erato/kawahara/projects/), working with [**Yasuaki Kakehi**](http://www.xlab.sfc.keio.ac.jp/) and [**Yoshihiro Kawahara**](http://www.akg.t.u-tokyo.ac.jp/) August, 2015 --- Current
**CU Boulder**, [**HCC Group**](http://hcc.colorado.edu/), working with [**Mark D. Gross**](http://mdgross.net/) and [**Tom Yeh**](http://tomyeh.info/) May, 2016 --- August, 2016
**UC Berkeley**, [**BiD Lab**](http://bid.berkeley.edu/), working with [**Bjoern Hartmann**](http://people.eecs.berkeley.edu/~bjoern/) May, 2015 --- August, 2015
**Stanford University**, [**HCI Group**](http://hci.stanford.edu/), working with [**Michael Bernstein**](http://hci.stanford.edu/msb/) October, 2014 --- May, 2015
**University of Tokyo**, [**IIS Lab**](http://iis-lab.org/), working with [**Koji Yatani**](http://yatani.jp/) December, 2014 --- March, 2015
**AIST**, [**Media Interaction Group**](https://staff.aist.go.jp/m.goto/MIG/index-j.html), working with [**Jun Kato**](http://junkato.jp/)
bodyHtml:
Research Experience

December, 2017 --- Current <br> University of Tokyo, ERATO Project, working with Yasuaki Kakehi and Yoshihiro Kawahara

August, 2015 --- Current <br> CU Boulder, HCC Group, working with Mark D. Gross and Tom Yeh

May, 2016 --- August, 2016 <br> UC Berkeley, BiD Lab, working with Bjoern Hartmann

May, 2015 --- August, 2015 <br> Stanford University, HCI Group, working with Michael Bernstein

October, 2014 --- May, 2015 <br> University of Tokyo, IIS Lab, working with Koji Yatani

December, 2014 --- March, 2015 <br> AIST, Media Interaction Group, working with Jun Kato
title: Research Experience
